item.description:
The Warehouse: Live Music, Free Food!!

There will be a music industry mixer at the newest club in
Hartford. It is huge, and is being called the “Toads Place of
Hartford”… for those of you familiar with Toads Place in New
Haven. Those of you who went to Shag Frenzy on Saturday know
how awesome this place is! Several different rooms, outdoor
patio, two stages. Details about the event on Sunday:

Date: Sunday, September 28
Time: 6pm to 1am

The Warehouse
45 Bartholomew Ave.
Hartford, CT

Free Food, Free Cover, Free Parking
OVER 15 bands will play on Sunday!!

Questions, contact Alina.
(619) 933-9277.
item.how_to_find_us: Alina plans on attending her contact info is listed below
item.name: The Warehouse: Live Music, Free Food!! 6PM-1AM
